name: WOO Codice Fiscale
author: Andrea Somovigo

sections.description:
A long-awaited FREE plugin for the Italian online stores running WOOCOMMERCE plugin, it simply adds one mandatory field ( ‘Codice Fiscale’) and one optional field ( ‘Partita Iva’).

Both these fields will be shown
-to users in their WOOCOMMERCE profile page

-to customers before checkout and after checkout in the “thank you” page

-to shop managers in the backoffice order-edit page.

-in the email messages sent to user and shop managers
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin-name.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. That’s all, no configuration needed

  • Fixed IE edge/win 10 issue and country code not properly formatted

1.5.3

  • Fixed backoffice not showing fields for php 5.2

1.5.2

  • Fixed javascript bug for sites selling only in Italy

1.5

  • Added conditional display for non-italian buyers

1.4

  • Warning bug fixed

1.3

  • Compatibility with Multisite installation

1.1

  • Cleaner Code

1.0

  • First version

short_description: WOOCOMMERCE Codice Fiscale FREE (GRATIS) is designed for Italian marketplaces running woocommerce to add CF and P.IVA to orders at checkout.
description:

Both these fields will be shown

screenshots.caption: The checkout mandatory field CF and optional P IVA
